item.title: Getting Started With Gtest
item.description: In this post we will have a brief introduction to the Google test library that will allow us to tests our C/C++ programs. Installing and compiling the Gtest library First, we need to install the library: sudo apt-get install libgtest-dev We compile using cmake: cd /usr/src/gtest sudo cmake CMakeLists.txt sudo make We copy libgtest.a and libgtest_main.a to /usr/lib: sudo cp *.a /usr/lib Getting started We will start with a very simple function:
